attributes.background: We the undersigned want the UK to rejoin the EU as a full member and to take the Euro as currency. No sitting on the fence this time, a fully fledged member at the European negotiating table.

rejection.details: The UK has not yet left the EU. You could start a new petition calling for the Government to give an undertaking that it will reapply for EU membership, on the terms you describe in your petition, as soon as the UK leaves the EU.
